thread.section_title: Prince de Galles Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service above Location
thread.title_full: Service above Location - Review of Prince de Galles Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dble-D
title: Service above Location
text:
Was impressed with the hotel staff and service. The front desk check-in process was smooth and had no issues. Security was tight and felt very secure while at the hotel. There was a reception of some type that shut down the street and areas of the hotel but the staff was quick to communicate what was coming.
Location is not bad and within a short cab trip from most tourist stops. It was around $20 Euros to Catacombes, and $15 to Louvre, and $10 to Eifel. Not an easy spot to jump on and off of the subway system. Breakfast was $30 to $50 but it did look good if you wanted to spend the money.
As you come out of the hotel when you turn left it is around 2 blocks down to the Champ Elysees and there are many nice restaurants to choose from.
